title: Mechanical Engineer 21-00024
full_description: Mechanical Engineer needed for a direct placement opportunity with our client in San Diego, 92126.JOB DESCRIPTIONThoroughly understand company's engineering and manufacturing workflow.Understand how engineering processes function within the quality management system (QMS).Identify efficiencies in engineering practices.Modify engineering work instructions to function within the ERP.Replace manual engineering functions with improved automated systems.Interface with supply chain and manufacturing to develop gates to trigger engineering outputs ahead of work-ready dates.Identify technical risks and develop mitigation plans.Develop BOMs from engineering documents, create work breakdown structures and workflows.QUALIFICATIONSPost-secondary degree in Engineering or equivalent combination of relevant education and work experience that will allow successful performance of job expectations.2 - 5 years of relevant experience.Able to improve products and systems by applying professional and business knowledge.Able to solve complex problems; makes decisions based on the analysis of multiple sources of information.Effective interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills to drive tasks to completion.Ability to generate professional engineering documentation and reports.Ability to quickly learn new software.Understanding of MBOMs, manufacturing workflow and configuration management.Prior experience in aerospace engineering and manufacturing, or ERP implementation.Ability to collaborate in a team in a fast-paced work environment.
